lead_paragraph: In this hour of Russia's deadly peril one would have to be cold-blooded indeed to pause for an analysis of communism or an inquiry into the character of Joseph Stalin. One's hopes and fears are with the Russian soldiers who after nearly four months of terrific fighting are still exchanging blow for blow with Hitler's massed legions.
